packagegui.title: Proxy Server: Antivirus

field.description: Enable Squid antivirus check using ClamAV.
Select what client info to forward to ClamAV.

option.name: Send both client username and IP info (Default)

field.description:
Warning: Only enable this if you know what you are doing.
When enabled, the options below no longer have any effect. You must edit the configuration files directly in the 'Advanced Features'.
After enabling manual configuration, click the button below once to load default configuration files. To disable manual configuration again, select 'disabled' and click 'Save'.

When a virus is found then redirect the user to this URL. Example: http://proxy.example.com/blocked.html
Leave empty to use the default Squid/pfSense WebGUI URL.

What kind of data to scan:
All: All data
Web: Web pages, scripts, images and documents
Applications: Executables, scripts, archives and documents
This option disables antivirus scanning of streamed video and audio for the default scan type.
This option enables blocking of Potentially Unwanted Applications.

Optionally, you can schedule ClamAV definitions updates via cron. Select the desired frequency here.
Important: Set to 'every 1 hour' if you want to use Google Safe Browsing feature.
Click the button below once to force the update of AV databases immediately. Note: This will take a while. Check freshclam log on the 'Real Time' tab for progress information.

Select a regional database mirror. Note: The default ClamAV database mirror performs extremely slow.
It is strongly recommended to choose a mirror here and/or configure your own mirrors manually below.

Enter ClamAV update servers here, or leave empty. Separate entries by semi-colons (;)
Note: For official update mirrors, use db.XY.clamav.net format. (Replace XY with your country code.)
Enables URLhaus active malware distribution sites DB support.
field.sethelp: The signature file only contains active malware distribution sites or such that have been added to URLhaus in past 48 hours. The false positive rate should be very low. See URLhaus ClamAV signatures for details.

field.description: Enables InterServer.net malware DB support.
field.sethelp: The signature file contains real time suspected malware list as detected by InterServer's InterShield protection system. See InterServer Real Time Malware Detection for details.

field.description: Enables SecuriteInfo.com malware DB support.
field.sethelp:
The signature files contains more that 4.000.000 signatures. At least free registration needed. See SecuriteInfo signatures info for details.
Warning: This option consumes significant amount of RAM.

field.description: Enables SecuriteInfo.com 0-day malware DB support.
field.sethelp: A valid premium subscription ID required.
